channel.title: About Me on
channel.description: Recent content in About Me on

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a Theoretical Computer Science (TCS) phd student in the ILLC. In 2022, I graduated from LSE with a M.S. in Logic. I like bouldering, ping-pong, skateboarding and smashing drum set at my spare time. Playing not bad! My girlfriend has been with me for 3 months. We all settled down in Amsterdam, Netherlands. And my favourite character is Snoopy. We look alike!
